name: Hiker: Heropack Creed
description:
All you need to do in the game is to constantly update the items in the pack, organize the props, match them reasonably, and start battles with various monsters to survive as much as possible!

As a brave and wise hiker, you must explore the mysterious cave without fear. The partners you meet on the road will help you repair your scarred body and strengthen your props; Fierce monsters, you need courage to fight them!

On the way to exploring, you will get a lot of props from monsters and partners - if you make a mistake in matching, you may be in trouble immediately! Reasonable collocation is the key to victory!

In order to get the legendary magical magic book, immediately enter the cave and start your adventure!

Features:
-Challenge 40+ monsters lurking in every corner, the content is rich and not repetitive!
-There are 200+ different items in the game, and the freshness is uninterrupted!
-Roguelike gameplay, relax and fast battle!
-Lighting up your talents can guarantee you a perfect victory in the next battle!
